name: solana-meteora-token-launcher
description: Solana Token Launch Platform with Meteora DLMM Integration - Create tokens + liquidity in under 60 seconds

scripts.build:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run setup-db

author: Meteora Token Launcher
